browse.title: The Shawshank Redemption
browse.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

browse.title: The Godfather
browse.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

browse.title: The Dark Knight
browse.description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

browse.title: Pulp Fiction
browse.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

browse.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
browse.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

browse.title: Schindlers List
browse.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturing kingpin faces a series of challenges and dangers.

browse.title: Game of Thrones
browse.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

browse.title: The Crown
browse.description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

browse.title: Stranger Things
browse.description: In a small town where everyone knows everyone, a group of kids discovers strange supernatural forces and a young girl with psychokinetic abilities.

browse.title: Friends
browse.description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

browse.title: Black Mirror
browse.description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

browse.title: The Office (US)
browse.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

browse.title: The Mandalorian
browse.description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, set after the fall of the Empire and before the rise of the First Order.

browse.title: Westworld
browse.description: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.

browse.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
browse.description: In a war-torn world, a bounty hunter embarks on a quest to find his adopted daughter, who has been chosen by an ancient prophecy.

browse.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
browse.description: Arthur Morgan, a member of the Dutch Van der Linde gang, seeks to survive and provide for his gang in the late 1800s.

browse.title: Overwatch
browse.description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter game featuring various heroes with unique abilities.

browse.description: An action-packed movie adaptation of the popular game Overwatch.
